_header: True on whom is all my trust
_description: Devotion to his mistress — one 8-line stanza (ababcdcd)

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
Trewe on Wam ys al my tryst& þat y serue as y best
                    canÞoȝ ȝe haue on me un lystSo hertly as yc am
                    ȝowre man…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…Let me nouȝt on ȝow craue & cryesyþþe
                    ȝe mowe me sylue saue
